Johann Caspar Lavater Correspondence

An ontology about Johann Caspar Lavater's correspondence
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Reto Baumgartner, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Z端rich, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of specific concepts in the critical edition of correspondence of Johann Caspar Lavater, 15 November 1741 - 2 January 1801.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Z端rich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about Johann Caspar Lavater's correspondence
edited Johann Caspar Lavater letter expression
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter expression either authored or received by Johann Caspar Lavater, and critically edited.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ scholarly-editing#CriticalEdition
Johann Caspar Lavater letter
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter send by or to Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ information-carrier#ArchiveElement
,
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ letter-corresponding#Letter
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ information-carrier#ConvoluteElement
Johann Caspar Lavater letter convolute
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Convolute of letters send by and to Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ information-carrier#ArchiveElement
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ information-carrier#Convolute
Johann Caspar Lavater letter expression
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter expression either authored by or written to by Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater#
rdfs:label
Johann Caspar Lavater letter expression
and
Brief-Expression Johann Caspar Lavaters
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ letter-corresponding#Expression
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#HandwrittenText
Johann Caspar Lavater letter page
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Page of a letter of Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ lavater#
rdfs:label
Johann Caspar Lavater letter page
and
Seite eines Briefes Johann Caspar Lavaters
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ information-carrier#Page
